text: The Federal Military Memorial Cemetery () is a national cemetery in north-west Moscow, Russia. The cemetery is considered as the Russian equivalent to Arlington National Cemetery. The cemetery was re-opened in June 2013, after 5 years of construction. == Other websites == * Vladimir Putin's last resting place - with Stalin in the telegraph website. Category:Buildings and structures in Moscow Category:National cemeteries Category:Military monuments and memorials
title: Federal Military Memorial Cemetery
